articles.description: Morocco has beaten Colombia 1-0 to reach the Women’s World Cup knockout round, creating yet more history in a dramatic conclusion to the group stage. Morocco is the first Arab or North African nation to go this far at the global women's tournament. And it is …
articles.content: PERTH, Australia (AP) After playing their part by edging Colombia 1-0, Moroccos Atlas Lionesses huddled on the pitch in Perth to follow the end of the Germany-South Korea group-stage finale at the Wo… [+4408 chars]
